title: Ticket #310: Fix SOAP seg-fault on Solaris
description:
The function condor__abortTransaction() in condor_schedd.V6/soap_scheddStub.cpp causes a segmentation fault on Solaris (9 is the only version we have seen this on).

The suspected culprit is a3ba8692 [14093], but there seems to be no reason why this change would trash the heap.
